Koala App

Technical Lead & UI Developer

Koala is a web app built to help web developers in their job-seeking process. I worked with a team of 3 talented individuals on this full-stack MERN application (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, and NodeJS). My role included:

  • Initial set-up of Express Server and configuration
  • Webpack configuration
  • deployment to Heroku
  • Github repository manager
  • UI/UX design and development
